achievements: Created iconic anime and manga series like Astro Boy, Kimba the White Lion, and Phoenix
Considered one of the most important Japanese authors of the 20th century
Known for his introspective and melancholic novels such as No Longer Human and The Setting Sun
Won the Nobel Prize in Chemistry in 2008 for the discovery and development of green fluorescent protein (GFP)
His work revolutionized biological research by providing a powerful tool for visualizing cellular processes
